summary: The implementation successfully addresses all requirements for multiple photo upload and product detail pages. All 9 requirements (REQ-26 through REQ-34) are implemented with proper image array handling in backend, multi-image upload/management in admin forms, updated displays across all frontend components, and a complete migration system. The code maintains the luxury design palette and follows architectural constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Image count badge display on watch management list for multi-image watches
hallucinated_features.reason: The frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions 'showing image count badge for multi-image watches' in WatchManagementList component, but this feature was not requested in any requirement. The BuildRequest only specified displaying the first image as thumbnail.
